long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online Threads video downloader
Threads Video Downloader, a free online tool to download and save videos and GIFs from Threads.

Our tool lets you download videos from Threads in the fastest way. You don't have to install any software on your computer or mobile phone.

All you need is a Threads video Thread link and all the processing is done on our side so that you can be one click away from downloading videos to your smartphones or desktops.

How to use Threads Downloader ?
1. Find the Thread that has the video or images of Gifs you want to download.
2. Tap the share icon and copy the Thread link.
3. Paste the Thread link into the URL text box above and click on "Download" button.
4. Click and download the format of your choice to your device.
